Title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
Plot: Bilbo Baggins is swept into a quest to reclaim the lost Dwarf Kingdom of Erebor from the fearsome dragon Smaug. Approached out of the blue by the wizard Gandalf the Grey, Bilbo finds himself joining a company of thirteen dwarves led by the legendary warrior, Thorin Oakenshield. Their journey will take them into the Wild; through treacherous lands swarming with Goblins and Orcs, deadly Wargs and Giant Spiders, Shapeshifters and Sorcerers. Although their goal lies to the East and the wastelands of the Lonely Mountain first they must escape the goblin tunnels, where Bilbo meets the creature that will change his life forever ... Gollum. Here, alone with Gollum, on the shores of an underground lake, the unassuming Bilbo Baggins not only discovers depths of guile and courage that surprise even him, he also gains possession of Gollum's "precious" ring that holds unexpected and useful qualities ... A simple, gold ring that is tied to the fate of all Middle-earth in ways Bilbo cannot begin to ...
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 12 wins & 72 nominations.
Writers: Fran Walsh, Philippa Boyens, Peter Jackson, Guillermo del Toro, J.R.R. Tolkien
Stars: Martin Freeman, Ian McKellen, Richard Armitage, Andy Serkis
Companies: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer (MGM), New Line Cinema, WingNut Films

Similars.Title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
Similars.FullTitle: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug (2013)
Similars.Plot: The dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey, continue their quest to reclaim Erebor, their homeland, from Smaug. Bilbo Baggins is in possession of a mysterious and magical ring.
Similars.Stars: Ian McKellen, Martin Freeman, Richard Armitage

Similars.Title: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
Similars.FullTitle: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies (2014)
Similars.Plot: Bilbo and company are forced to engage in a war against an array of combatants and keep the Lonely Mountain from falling into the hands of a rising darkness.
Similars.Stars: Ian McKellen, Martin Freeman, Richard Armitage

Similars.Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
Similars.FullTitle: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (2002)
Similars.Plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.
Similars.Stars: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen

Similars.Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Similars.FullTitle: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (2001)
Similars.Plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
Similars.Stars: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom

Similars.Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
Similars.FullTitle: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (2003)
Similars.Plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
Similars.Stars: Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen

Similars.Title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
Similars.FullTitle: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest (2006)
Similars.Plot: Jack Sparrow races to recover the heart of Davy Jones to avoid enslaving his soul to Jones' service, as other friends and foes seek the heart for their own agenda as well.
Similars.Stars: Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley

Similars.Title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
Similars.FullTitle: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl (2003)
Similars.Plot: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.
Similars.Stars: Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom

Similars.Title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
Similars.FullTitle: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End (2007)
Similars.Plot: Captain Barbossa, Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann must sail off the edge of the map, navigate treachery and betrayal, find Jack Sparrow, and make their final alliances for one last decisive battle.
Similars.Stars: Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley

Similars.Title: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
Similars.FullTitle: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides (2011)
Similars.Plot: Jack Sparrow and Barbossa embark on a quest to find the elusive fountain of youth, only to discover that Blackbeard and his daughter are after it too.

Similars.Plot: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
